1125260.name: Hide Or Die - Supporter Pack
1125260.description:
The Hide or Die Supporter Pack is a collection of digital goods for those who wish to go the extra mile to support the development of Hide or Die and the developer VecFour Digital. These skins give you a glimpse into the lives of our 3 main Hunters before the darkness fully consumed Bale County.

Includes:


  • Scientist Supporter Skin - Young Scientist
  • Scientist Supporter Weapon Skin - Razor & Nail Bat
  • Fisherman Supporter Skin - Hazmat
  • Fisherman Supporter Weapon Skin - Harpoon Gun
  • Fisherman Supporter Weapon Skin - Cattle Prod
  • Stitches Supporter Skin - Prisoner
  • Supporter T-Shirt - Turtle Lake
  • Supporter Phone Case - Red Hex
  • Supporter Nametag Banner - Supporter Banner
  • Hide or Die Digital Soundtrack

Digital Soundtrack Tracklist:

  • 1.) Hide Or Die - 2:48
  • 2.) Below The Earth - 2:35
  • 3.) Last Man Standing - 2:09
  • 4.) Dark Wonder - 2:45
  • 5.) Alone - 2:16
  • 6.) Odd Place - 3:18
  • 7.) Drop - 1:30
  • 8.) Chase - 2:13
  • 9.) Ominous - 1:49

NOTE: Skins will be unlocked and available to be equipped when the associated character is unlocked in game. Purchasing this bundle will NOT unlock your character in advance. You will still need to progress in the game to unlock the character and associated skins.
1125260.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
